html:
The day is near to end
The night is soon to come
In a wooden hoot
A witch starts making poison
She’ll pour it into water
To the delivery system
A lot of people will die
She is a terrorist
The poison is neurotoxin
Made carefully with passion
So families of Smiths
Will get unpleasant surprise
No one knows what’s in the hoot
So the witch is not afraid
She makes her poisons often
At nights of full moon
title: Witch
